1: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>upon</n> הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת <sup>5155 </sup> <n>upon Nehiloth</n> מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> אֲמָרַ֖י <sup>561 </sup> <n>to my words</n> הַאֲזִ֥ינָה ׀ <sup>238 </sup> <n>Give ear</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> בִּ֣ינָה <sup>995 </sup> <n>consider</n> הֲגִֽיגִי׃ <sup>1901 </sup> <n>my meditation</n>
2: הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה ׀ <sup>7181 </sup> <n>Hearken</n> לְק֬וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>unto the voice</n> שַׁוְעִ֗י <sup>7773 </sup> <n>of my cry</n> מַלְכִּ֥י <sup>4428 </sup> <n>my King</n> וֵאלֹהָ֑י <sup>430 </sup> <n>and my God</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃ <sup>6419 </sup> <n>for unto thee will I pray</n>
3: יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> בֹּ֭קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> תִּשְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shalt thou hear</n> קוֹלִ֑י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>My voice</n> בֹּ֥קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> אֶֽעֱרָךְ־ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>will I direct</n> לְ֝ךָ֗ וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>[my prayer] unto thee and will look up</n>
4: כִּ֤י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> אֵֽל־ <sup>410 </sup> <n>For thou [art] not a God</n> חָפֵ֘ץ <sup>2655 </sup> <n>that hath pleasure</n> רֶ֥שַׁע ׀ <sup>7562 </sup> <n>in wickedness</n> אָ֑תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יְגֻרְךָ֣ <sup>1481 </sup> <n>dwell</n> רָֽע׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>neither shall evil</n>
5: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <sup>3320 </sup> <n>shall not stand</n> הֽ֭וֹלְלִים <sup>1984 </sup> <n>The foolish</n> לְנֶ֣גֶד <sup>2962 </sup> <n>before</n> עֵינֶ֑יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in thy sight</n> שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>thou hatest</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <sup>6466 </sup> <n>all workers</n> אָֽוֶן׃ <sup>205 </sup> <n>of iniquity</n>
6: תְּאַבֵּד֮ <sup>6 </sup> <n>Thou shalt destroy</n> דֹּבְרֵ֪י <sup>1696 </sup> <n>them that speak</n> כָ֫זָ֥ב <sup>3577 </sup> <n>leasing</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> דָּמִ֥ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the bloody</n> וּמִרְמָ֗ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>and deceitful</n> יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב ׀ <sup>8581 </sup> <n>will abhor</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
7: וַאֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>by</n> בְּרֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>in the multitude</n> חַ֭סְדְּךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>of thy mercy</n> אָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>But as for me I will come</n> בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>[into] thy house</n> אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <sup>7812 </sup> <n>will I worship</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הֵֽיכַל־ <sup>1964 </sup> <n>temple</n> קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>toward thy holy</n> בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3374 </sup> <n>[and] in thy fear</n>
8: יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> נְחֵ֬נִי <sup>5148 </sup> <n>Lead</n> בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>in thy righteousness</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because</n> שׁוֹרְרָ֑י <sup>8324 </sup> <n>because of mine enemies</n> [הֹושַׁר כ] (הַיְשַׁ֖ר <sup>3474 </sup> <n>direct</n> ק) לְפָנַ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before my face</n> דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>make thy way</n>
9: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֪ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> בְּפִ֡יהוּ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>in their mouth</n> נְכוֹנָה֮ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>For [there is] no faithfulness</n> קִרְבָּ֪ם <sup>7130 </sup> <n>their inward</n> הַ֫וּ֥וֹת <sup>1942 </sup> <n>part [is] very wickedness</n> קֶֽבֶר־ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>sepulchre</n> פָּת֥וּחַ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>[is] an open</n> גְּרוֹנָ֑ם <sup>1627 </sup> <n>their throat</n> לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>with their tongue</n> יַחֲלִֽיקוּן׃ <sup>2505 </sup> <n>they flatter</n>
10: הַֽאֲשִׁימֵ֨ם ׀ <sup>816 </sup> <n>Destroy</n> אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>thou them O God</n> יִפְּלוּ֮ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>let them fall</n> מִֽמֹּעֲצ֪וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <sup>4156 </sup> <n>by their own counsels</n> בְּרֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>in the multitude</n> פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>of their transgressions</n> הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>cast them out</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מָ֥רוּ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>for they have rebelled</n> בָֽךְ׃
11: וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>in thee rejoice</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> ח֪וֹסֵי <sup>2620 </sup> <n>But let all those that put their trust</n> בָ֡ךְ לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>let them ever</n> יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>shout for joy</n> וְתָסֵ֣ךְ <sup>5526 </sup> <n>because thou defendest</n> עָלֵ֑ימוֹ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ <sup>5970 </sup> <n>be joyful</n> בְ֝ךָ֗ אֹהֲבֵ֥י <sup>157 </sup> <n>them let them also that love</n> שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>thy name</n>
12: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַתָּה֮ <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> תְּבָרֵ֪ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>wilt bless</n> צַ֫דִּ֥יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For thou LORD</n> כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה <sup>6793 </sup> <n>him as [with] a shield</n> רָצ֥וֹן <sup>7522 </sup> <n>with favour</n> תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>5849 </sup> <n>wilt thou compass</n>
